alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Dawson; Forsyth; Gwinnett; Hall; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Barrow, Forsyth, northeastern Gwinnett, southeastern Dawson, southern Hall and northwestern Jackson Counties through 530 AM EDT... At 457 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Coal Mountain, or near Cumming, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. Areas in the path of this storm were heavily impacted by severe winds late Thursday. Please use extra caution if working outside on clean up efforts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Lawrenceville, Cumming, Sugar Hill, Suwanee, Buford, Braselton, Auburn, Flowery Branch, Dacula, Oakwood, Hoschton, Pendergrass, Talmo, Rest Haven, Dougherty, Candler, Drew, Chateau Elan and Buford Dam-Lake Lanier Parks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Barrow; Dawson; Forsyth; Gwinnett; Hall; Jackson
